channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: IFS Puts Hard Hats On ‘Industrial AI’ Workforce
item.description: IFS' acquisition of theLoops creates enterprise software that tracks industrial workflows to performs workplace jobs, tasks and wider functions.

item.title: Apple iPhone 17 Pro And Phone 17 Air: The Best Views Yet Of New Designs Just Leaked
item.description: A new dummy claiming to show what the next Pro iPhone will look like has just leaked.

item.title: Erectile Dysfunction Is Rising, And It’s More Than Just Blood Flow

item.title: How To Stay Cool In A Post-Climate World

item.title: A Quadruple Bottom Line. Can ProSocial AI influence Business For Good?
item.description: Pressured amid AI the traditional business focus on profit is evolving, to balance people, planet, profit and purpose — the quadruple bottom line?
